message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,000 is simply not feasible for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000? It's still a great price for you, considering the value you place on the product.
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit far from $15,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $13,500 is still a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down a bit further.  How about we settle on $14,000? This price allows me to cover my costs and gives you a good deal.  Let's make this happen!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $13,750. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
